oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and sentences given by !nanni and Tamme, including times, the boys' 'country', and Tamme's language (his 'speech is one, not many'). Many of the !kun only speak one language. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: times, country and language
